data.title: My Awesome Trip to Singapore: The Sunny Island!

children.text: Hey guys! So, I just got back from this super cool trip to Singapore, and I have to tell you all about it. It was such a fun mix of learning, exploring, and, of course, eating!

Here’s what went down: We started off with an opening ceremony at NTU (Nanyang Technological University), and let me tell you, this place is HUGE. Like, seriously massive. We got to explore the campus, and the best part was taking pics with the Hive Building. It’s this super iconic building that looks like a beehive (duh, right?). But get this—our student guide told us there are 56 classrooms inside! How crazy is that? I couldn’t even imagine having classes in such a cool-looking building.

After the tour, we went for lunch at Song Fa Bak Kut Teh, which is apparently super famous. It was my first time trying it, and it was… interesting. The dough fritters were really good with the soup, but the soup itself was way too peppery for me. Still, it was fun to try something new! Oh, and throughout the trip, we got to try Malay food too. It was so flavorful and different from what I’m used to. I’m definitely a fan now!

The AI courses at NTU were actually pretty cool. We had these discussions and exchanges about artificial intelligence, and it was mind-blowing to hear how it’s being used in the real world. The best part? At the end of the session, we got to create our own model! It was so satisfying to see something we learned about actually come to life.

Now, let’s talk about the real fun—Sentosa Island! I didn’t even know this before, but Sentosa is actually its own little island. People used to only get there by cable car or car, but a few years ago, they built a walkway, so now it’s super easy to get to. And oh my gosh, the rollercoasters! I screamed my lungs out, but it was SO MUCH FUN. If you ever go to Sentosa, you have to try them. Trust me, it’s worth it.

This trip was honestly one of the best experiences ever. I got to explore a huge university, try new foods, learn about AI, and have a blast at Sentosa. Singapore is such a cool place—sunny, vibrant, and full of surprises. If you ever get the chance to go, don’t think twice. Just do it!

data.author: Max

data.title: 我的新加坡之旅：阳光小岛的冒险！

children.text: 大家好！我刚刚从新加坡回来，这趟旅行真的太棒了，我一定要跟你们分享一下！这次旅行有学习、有探索，当然还有美食！
下面就来聊聊我的经历吧～我们一开始参加了南洋理工大学（NTU）的开营仪式，说实话，这个学校真的超级大！我们参观了校园，最酷的是和 The Hive 大楼拍了照。这栋楼看起来像个蜂巢（名字就是这么来的嘛），但最让我震惊的是，学生导游告诉我们，里面竟然有 56 间教室！这也太夸张了吧？我完全无法想象在这么酷的建筑里上课是什么感觉。
参观完校园后，我们去吃了有名的松发肉骨茶。这是我第一次尝试肉骨茶，感觉……挺特别的。油条配汤很好吃，但汤本身对我来说太辣了，胡椒味太重。不过，尝试新东西还是挺有趣的！对了，整个旅行中我们还吃了很多马来菜，味道超级丰富，和我平时吃的东西很不一样。我现在已经是马来菜的粉丝了！
说实话，NTU 的人工智能课程还挺有意思的。我们讨论了 AI 的应用，听了很多实际案例，感觉打开了新世界的大门。最棒的是，课程结束后我们还自己动手做了一个模型！看到学到的知识变成实际的东西，真的超有成就感。
现在来说说最开心的部分——圣淘沙岛！我之前都不知道，圣淘沙其实是一个独立的小岛。以前人们只能坐缆车或开车去，但几年前他们建了一条步行道，现在去圣淘沙方便多了。还有，环球影城的过山车真的太刺激了！我全程尖叫，但真的超级好玩！如果你去圣淘沙，一定要试试，绝对不会后悔！
这次旅行真的是我经历过最棒的事情之一。我参观了一所超大的大学，尝试了新美食，学习了人工智能，还在圣淘沙玩得超嗨。新加坡真的是一个又阳光、又充满活力的地方，到处都是惊喜。如果你有机会去，千万别犹豫，赶紧出发吧！

data.author: 马克斯

data.title: 我在爱普森学院的夏令营经历：16天的语言、文化与乐趣

children.text: 今年夏天，我有幸参加了在英国爱普森学院举办的为期16天的全球夏令营。这是一次学习、冒险和文化探索的完美结合。白天，我们上了ESL课程，既充满挑战又非常有趣。老师们非常棒——他们友好、耐心，总是鼓励我们举手发言、分享自己的想法。
我感觉我的英语口语每天都在进步！课后，我们参加了各种室内游戏和户外活动。户外活动是我的最爱，因为我们可以一起玩不同的团队运动。篮球绝对是亮点！晚上的活动也同样精彩。第一天晚上，我们举办了电影之夜，放映了《碟中谍》。和来自世界各地的新朋友一起看电影真是太有趣了。我们笑着、欢呼着，在紧张刺激的场景中建立了深厚的友谊。
夏令营最棒的部分之一是外出游览。我们参观了博物馆，在那里我看到了来自古埃及、罗马和中国的迷人文物。我拍了很多照片，感觉就像穿越了时空！最让我印象深刻的是参观牛津大学。走在历史悠久的校园里，周围都是学者和学生，简直像梦想成真。
这次经历激励我更加努力学习，追求更高的目标。游览结束后，我们回到爱普森学院继续上课。我们深入学习了逻辑思维和文化课程，这些课程让我大开眼界。我学到了很多关于不同文化和观点的知识，这让我更加欣赏世界的多样性。至于英国的食物……一开始有点“呃”！它和我平时吃的不太一样，但我很快就找到了自己喜欢的食物。意大利面和黄油面包成了我的最爱。我还尝试了一些传统的英国菜，只能说很有趣！
回顾这次夏令营，它不仅仅是一个语言项目——更是一次成长、友谊和发现的旅程。我提高了英语水平，结交了终身的朋友，也对世界有了更深的理解。

data.author: 本

data.title: My Summer Camp Experience at Epsom College: 16 Days of Language, Culture, and Fun

children.text: This summer, I had the incredible opportunity to attend a 16-day global camp at Epsom College in the UK. It was a perfect blend of learning, adventure, and cultural exploration. During the day, we had ESL classes, which were both challenging and fun. The teachers were amazing—friendly, patient, and always encouraging us to raise our hands and share our ideas.

I felt my confidence in speaking English grow every day! After classes, we enjoyed a mix of indoor games and outdoor activities. The outdoor activities were my favorite because we got to play different sports as a team. Basketball was definitely the highlight! The evenings were just as exciting. On the first night, we had a movie night, and they screened Mission: Impossible. It was so much fun watching it with my new friends from all over the world. We laughed, cheered, and bonded over the action-packed scenes.

One of the best parts of the camp was the excursion trips. We visited museums where I saw fascinating artifacts from ancient Egypt, Rome, and China. I took so many pictures—it felt like I was traveling through time! The most inspiring trip was to Oxford University. Walking through the historic campus, surrounded by academics and students, was a dream come true.

This experience motivated me to work harder and aim higher. After the excursions, we returned to Epsom College for more lessons. We dove into logical thinking and cultural lessons, which were eye-opening. I learned so much about different cultures and perspectives, and it made me appreciate the diversity of our world even more. The food in the UK was...meh at the start! It was different from what I’m used to, but I quickly found my favorites. Pasta and bread with butter became my go-to meals. I even tried some traditional British dishes, which were interesting, to say the least!

Looking back, this summer camp was more than just a language program—it was a journey of growth, friendship, and discovery. I improved my English, made lifelong friends, and gained a deeper understanding of the world.

data.title: 我在立命馆大学难忘的语言交流项目

children.text: 去年，我参加了日本立命馆大学为期两周的语言交流项目。项目安排是每天早上9点到12点的课程。立命馆大学的老师们非常耐心和支持。尽管我在发音上有时会遇到困难，但他们总是鼓励我，让学习过程变得愉快。他们的帮助让我在日语口语上更加自信，我真的很感激他们的指导。我非常想念他们！
项目的亮点之一是文化活动。每周我们会在工作日参加两次文化体验，这些活动非常有趣。第一次活动是观看舞伎和艺伎的表演。她们的优雅和技艺让我惊叹不已。最让我震惊的是了解到她们需要经历多年的严格训练。在训练期间，她们不能使用手机或回家，而且她们的服装非常复杂和特别。
第二次活动是日本太鼓。我们亲自尝试了打鼓，这是一次充满乐趣和活力的体验。早上课程结束后，我会和同学们在学校食堂一起吃午餐。食堂的饭菜不仅价格实惠，而且非常美味！我最喜欢的是散寿司饭——一碗寿司米饭，上面铺满新鲜的刺身，旁边还有一个完美的温泉蛋。
周末休息时，我有机会探索京都这座充满历史和文化的城市。从参观金阁寺这样的美丽寺庙，到漫步在标志性的岚山竹林，每一刻都像是一次新的冒险。京都传统与现代的结合让我感到震撼，我很高兴能体验到这一切。
回顾这段经历，这次语言交流项目不仅仅是学习日语——它是一次个人成长、文化理解和创造终身回忆的旅程。我提高了语言能力，深入了解了日本传统，并结识了来自世界各地的朋友。下次见，じゃあね！（See you later!）

data.author: 瑞

data.title: My Unforgettable Language Exchange Program at Ritsumeikan University

children.text: Last year, I participated in a two-week language exchange program at Ritsumeikan University in Japan. The program was structured with morning classes from 9 AM to 12 PM. The teachers at Ritsumeikan University were incredibly patient and supportive. Even though I struggled with pronouncing Japanese words at times, they were always encouraging and made the learning process enjoyable. Their dedication helped me gain confidence in speaking Japanese, and I’m so grateful for their guidance. I miss them so much!

One of the highlights of the program was the cultural activities. Each week, we had two cultural experiences on weekdays, and they were absolutely fascinating. The first activity was watching a Maiko and Geiko performance. I was completely amazed by their grace and skill. What shocked me the most was learning about the years of rigorous training they undergo. During their training, they aren’t allowed to use phones or go home, and their traditional clothing is incredibly intricate and special.

The second activity was Japanese drumming (Taiko). We got to try beating the drums ourselves, and it was such a fun and energetic experience. After morning classes, I would have lunch with my classmates at the school canteen. The meals were not only affordable but also delicious! My absolute favorite was chirashi don—a bowl of sushi rice topped with fresh sashimi and a perfectly cooked onsen egg on the side.

With weekends off, I had the chance to explore Kyoto, a city rich in history and culture. From visiting stunning temples like Kinkaku-ji to strolling through the iconic Arashiyama Bamboo Grove, every moment felt like a new adventure. Kyoto’s blend of tradition and modernity left me in awe, and I’m so glad I got to experience it.

Looking back, this language exchange program was more than just learning Japanese—it was a journey of personal growth, cultural understanding, and making lifelong memories. I improved my language skills, immersed myself in Japanese traditions, and met amazing people from all over the world. Until next time, じゃあね!

data.title: 美国语言夏令营：学习、友谊与乐趣！

children.text: 我在夏令营度过了非常愉快的时光！夏令营的食堂提供自助餐，所以我可以尝试各种美食——意大利面、沙拉、汉堡和甜点！这是体验美国美食的美味方式。
我们还参加了一些令人兴奋的旅行，比如参观了麻省理工学院及其博物馆，那里的未来科技让我大开眼界。另一次旅行是去普利茅斯，我们在那里了解了美国历史，非常有趣！
接下来的几天，我参加了一个名为如何选择合适学校的讲座，这让我对未来有了更多的思考。我还获得了关于托福和SAT考试的技巧，这些将帮助我在申请学校时脱颖而出。老师们非常支持我，现在我对说英语更有信心了。
晚上的活动是最棒的！我们有卡拉OK之夜，可以唱我们最喜欢的歌曲；还有迪斯科舞会，大家跳个不停；还有电影之夜，我们一起看电影。我最喜欢的是夏威夷舞会。还有文化展示，我们分享了各自国家的传统，了解不同文化真是太酷了。
这次夏令营教会我的不仅仅是英语。我学会了如何为大学申请写一份出色的简历和论文。我甚至有机会与大学招生顾问交流，他们给了我很多宝贵的建议。但最棒的是，我结交了来自世界各地的朋友，我们已经约定要保持联系！这次夏令营是我一生中最美好的经历之一。

data.author: Leo

data.title: US Language Camp: Learning, Friends, and Fun!

children.text: I had an amazing time at the camp! The camp canteen served buffet-style meals, so I could try everything—pasta, salads, burgers, and desserts! It was a delicious way to experience American food.

We also went on exciting trips, like visiting MIT and its museum, where I saw futuristic technology that blew my mind. Another trip was to Plymouth, where we learned about American history. It was so interesting!

In the next few days, I attended a seminar called "How to Choose the Right School," which helped me think about my future. I also got tips for the TOEFL and SAT exams, which will help me stand out when applying to schools. The teachers were super supportive, and I feel much more confident speaking English now.

Evenings were the best part! We had karaoke nights where we sang our favorite songs, disco parties where we danced nonstop, and movie nights where we watched films together. My favorite was the Hawaiian dance party. There was also a cultural showcase, where we shared traditions from our countries. It was so cool to learn about different cultures.

This camp taught me so much more than English. I learned how to write a strong resume and essay for college applications. I even got to talk to university admissions counselors, who gave me great advice. But the best part was making friends from all over the world. We've already promised to stay in touch! This camp was one of the best experiences of my life.

这次旅行真的是我经历过最棒的事情之一。我参观了一所超大的大学，尝试了新美食，学习了人工智能，还在圣淘沙玩得超嗨。新加坡真的是一个又阳光、又充满活力的地方，到处都是惊喜。如果你有机会去，千万别犹豫，赶紧出发吧！

data.author: 马克斯

data.title: 我在立命馆大学难忘的语言交流项目

children.text: 去年，我参加了日本立命馆大学为期两周的语言交流项目。项目安排是每天早上9点到12点的课程。立命馆大学的老师们非常耐心和支持。尽管我在发音上有时会遇到困难，但他们总是鼓励我，让学习过程变得愉快。他们的帮助让我在日语口语上更加自信，我真的很感激他们的指导。我非常想念他们！
项目的亮点之一是文化活动。每周我们会在工作日参加两次文化体验，这些活动非常有趣。第一次活动是观看舞伎和艺伎的表演。她们的优雅和技艺让我惊叹不已。最让我震惊的是了解到她们需要经历多年的严格训练。在训练期间，她们不能使用手机或回家，而且她们的服装非常复杂和特别。
第二次活动是日本太鼓。我们亲自尝试了打鼓，这是一次充满乐趣和活力的体验。早上课程结束后，我会和同学们在学校食堂一起吃午餐。食堂的饭菜不仅价格实惠，而且非常美味！我最喜欢的是散寿司饭——一碗寿司米饭，上面铺满新鲜的刺身，旁边还有一个完美的温泉蛋。
周末休息时，我有机会探索京都这座充满历史和文化的城市。从参观金阁寺这样的美丽寺庙，到漫步在标志性的岚山竹林，每一刻都像是一次新的冒险。京都传统与现代的结合让我感到震撼，我很高兴能体验到这一切。
回顾这段经历，这次语言交流项目不仅仅是学习日语——它是一次个人成长、文化理解和创造终身回忆的旅程。我提高了语言能力，深入了解了日本传统，并结识了来自世界各地的朋友。下次见，じゃあね！（See you later!）

data.author: 瑞

data.title: 美国语言夏令营：学习、友谊与乐趣！

children.text: 我在夏令营度过了非常愉快的时光！夏令营的食堂提供自助餐，所以我可以尝试各种美食——意大利面、沙拉、汉堡和甜点！这是体验美国美食的美味方式。
我们还参加了一些令人兴奋的旅行，比如参观了麻省理工学院及其博物馆，那里的未来科技让我大开眼界。另一次旅行是去普利茅斯，我们在那里了解了美国历史，非常有趣！
接下来的几天，我参加了一个名为如何选择合适学校的讲座，这让我对未来有了更多的思考。我还获得了关于托福和SAT考试的技巧，这些将帮助我在申请学校时脱颖而出。老师们非常支持我，现在我对说英语更有信心了。
晚上的活动是最棒的！我们有卡拉OK之夜，可以唱我们最喜欢的歌曲；还有迪斯科舞会，大家跳个不停；还有电影之夜，我们一起看电影。我最喜欢的是夏威夷舞会。还有文化展示，我们分享了各自国家的传统，了解不同文化真是太酷了。
这次夏令营教会我的不仅仅是英语。我学会了如何为大学申请写一份出色的简历和论文。我甚至有机会与大学招生顾问交流，他们给了我很多宝贵的建议。但最棒的是，我结交了来自世界各地的朋友，我们已经约定要保持联系！这次夏令营是我一生中最美好的经历之一。

data.author: Leo

data.title: 我的第一次海外冒险：日本的STEM项目

children.text: 当我第一次得知要去日本参加STEM项目时，我既兴奋又紧张。这是我第一次出国旅行，我不知道会发生什么。我的父母也很担心，他们一直问我是否准备好了，没有他们我能不能照顾好自己。
但在日本度过一周后，我可以诚实地说，这是我一生中最美好的经历之一，而我的父母也不再担心了！这个项目非常棒。我们做了很多有趣的事情，比如参观高科技实验室和学习机器人技术。我甚至还自己动手做了一个迷你机器人！日本的技术非常先进——感觉就像走进了未来。
其中一个亮点是参观科学博物馆，在那里我们看到了可以玩体育项目甚至与人对话的机器人，真是太震撼了！我也很喜欢这个项目将学习与乐趣结合在一起的方式。我们参加了研讨会，在团队中合作解决问题，看到每个人的想法汇聚在一起真是太棒了。
我结交了很多来自不同国家的新朋友，我们因为对科学和技术的热爱而建立了深厚的友谊。看到STEM如何将来自世界各地的人们联系在一起，真是太酷了。当然，也有一些挑战。起初，我有点想家，语言障碍有时也让事情变得棘手。但项目负责人非常支持我们，确保我们感到安全和舒适。
到一周结束时，我感觉自己已经可以在这座城市里自如地活动，甚至可以用日语点餐了！当我在餐厅成功点了一碗拉面时，那种自豪感真是难以形容。这次旅行最棒的部分之一是向自己——还有我的父母——证明了我可以独立应对一切。我学会了如何管理时间、照顾自己的物品，并适应新环境。
当我告诉父母我所做的一切时，他们非常自豪，还说他们不再担心我一个人旅行了。日本是一个令人难以置信的地方，而这个STEM项目让它变得更加特别。我永远不会忘记我结交的朋友、学到的东西以及经历的冒险。

data.author: 杰森

data.title: My First Overseas Adventure: A STEM Program in Japan

children.text: When I first found out I was going to Japan for a STEM program, I was so excited but also really nervous. It was my first time traveling overseas, and I didn't know what to expect. My parents were worried, too. They kept asking me if I was ready and would be okay without them.

But after spending a week in Japan, I can honestly say it was one of the best experiences of my life, and my parents aren't worried anymore! The program was amazing. We did so many cool things, like visiting high-tech labs and learning about robotics. I even got to build my own mini robot! Japan's technology is so advanced—it felt like stepping into the future.

One of the highlights was visiting a science museum where we saw robots that could play sports and even have conversations. It was mind-blowing! I also loved how the program mixed learning with fun. We had workshops where we worked in teams to solve problems, and it was awesome to see how everyone's ideas came together.

I made so many new friends from different countries, and we all bonded over our love for science and technology. It was cool to see how STEM brings people together, no matter where they're from. Of course, there were some challenges too. At first, I was a little homesick, and the language barrier made things tricky sometimes. But the program leaders were so supportive, and they made sure we felt safe and comfortable.

By the end of the week, I felt like I could navigate the city and even order food in Japanese! It was such a proud moment when I successfully asked for ramen at a restaurant. One of the best parts of the trip was proving to myself—and my parents—that I could handle being on my own. I learned how to manage my time, take care of my things, and adapt to new situations.

My parents were so proud when I told them about everything I did, and they said they were not worried about me traveling alone anymore. Japan was an incredible place, and the STEM program made it even more special. I'll never forget the friends I made, the things I learned, and the adventures I had.

data.author: Jason

data.title: 我在爱普森学院的夏令营经历：16天的语言、文化与乐趣

children.text: 今年夏天，我有幸参加了在英国爱普森学院举办的为期16天的全球夏令营。这是一次学习、冒险和文化探索的完美结合。白天，我们上了ESL课程，既充满挑战又非常有趣。老师们非常棒——他们友好、耐心，总是鼓励我们举手发言、分享自己的想法。
我感觉我的英语口语每天都在进步！课后，我们参加了各种室内游戏和户外活动。户外活动是我的最爱，因为我们可以一起玩不同的团队运动。篮球绝对是亮点！晚上的活动也同样精彩。第一天晚上，我们举办了电影之夜，放映了《碟中谍》。和来自世界各地的新朋友一起看电影真是太有趣了。我们笑着、欢呼着，在紧张刺激的场景中建立了深厚的友谊。
夏令营最棒的部分之一是外出游览。我们参观了博物馆，在那里我看到了来自古埃及、罗马和中国的迷人文物。我拍了很多照片，感觉就像穿越了时空！最让我印象深刻的是参观牛津大学。走在历史悠久的校园里，周围都是学者和学生，简直像梦想成真。
这次经历激励我更加努力学习，追求更高的目标。游览结束后，我们回到爱普森学院继续上课。我们深入学习了逻辑思维和文化课程，这些课程让我大开眼界。我学到了很多关于不同文化和观点的知识，这让我更加欣赏世界的多样性。至于英国的食物……一开始有点“呃”！它和我平时吃的不太一样，但我很快就找到了自己喜欢的食物。意大利面和黄油面包成了我的最爱。我还尝试了一些传统的英国菜，只能说很有趣！
回顾这次夏令营，它不仅仅是一个语言项目——更是一次成长、友谊和发现的旅程。我提高了英语水平，结交了终身的朋友，也对世界有了更深的理解。

data.title: 狮城“海陆空”轻奢英语营

children.text: 新加坡"海陆空"英语营是一个为期7天的沉浸式项目，专为10至15岁的学生设计。该项目将官方雅思备考课程与独特的文化体验相结合，为学生提供学习与冒险的完美结合。学生们将探索新加坡的标志性景点，参与实践活动，并在提升英语能力的同时享受奢华体验。通过小班教学和专家指导，该项目确保为年轻学习者提供一个安全、充实且难忘的旅程。
- 雅思备考：专为年轻学习者设计的官方雅思课程，重点提升词汇、听力和口语能力
- 独特主题：通过"海陆空"主题探索新加坡，包括参观滨海堤坝、滨海湾花园和新加坡摩天观景轮
- 文化沉浸：通过参观牛车水、小印度和甘榜格南，体验新加坡的多元文化遗产
- 奢华体验：享受美食，入住市中心酒店，并参观环球影城等世界级景点
- 小班教学：每班最多15名学生，确保个性化关注和支持性学习环境

新加坡科学与创新STEM夏令营是一个为期7天的项目，专为7岁及以上学生设计（家长可选择参与）。该夏令营为学生提供了一个独特的机会，通过动手实践、互动工作坊以及参观新加坡科学馆和南洋理工大学（NTU）等标志性机构，探索新加坡的前沿科技。参与者将参与STEM项目，学习人工智能与环境可持续发展的知识，并体验新加坡丰富的文化遗产，同时还能享受滨海湾花园和新加坡环球影城等世界级景点的乐趣。
• AI与STEM重点：在新加坡南洋理工大学和科学中心等顶级机构进行课程和工作坊。

• 社交活动：参与小组作业和团队建设练习，促进合作与友谊。
• 专家指导：向经验丰富的教育工作者和行业专业人士学习，深入了解STEM和AI的未来。

data.title: 2025年新加坡南洋理工大学AI探索项目

data.title: 英国爱普森公学国际夏令营

children.text: 爱普森学院国际夏令营为12-17岁的学生提供了在一个享有盛誉的英国寄宿学校环境中体验精英英国教育的独特机会。该项目将密集的英语语言学习与广泛的学术科目和课外活动相结合。爱普森学院美丽的84英亩校园位于距离伦敦仅15英里的地方，学生可以使用世界一流的设施，同时通过组织前往伦敦、牛津和其他历史遗址的远足来探索英国文化。在合格教师的专业教学、24小时监督和全面的寄宿设施下，这个夏令营提供了学术丰富、文化沉浸和娱乐活动的完美平衡。（截止日期 5/05, 5/19; 6/1）
• 顶级英国目的地：在这个以世界一流学术资源闻名的英语国家，体验最优质的英式教育。
• 精英学校体验：在埃普森学院（Epsom College）住宿和用餐，这是一所历史悠久、学术卓越并充满关怀环境的学府。

data.title: 日本东京动漫文化探索访学营

children.text: 2025年夏季日本东京动漫文化探索项目是一个为期7天的沉浸式体验，专为7岁及以上学生设计（家长可选择参与）。该项目为学生提供了一个独特的机会，深入探索日本充满活力的动漫文化，参观标志性的漫画博物馆，与职业漫画家面对面交流，并探访东京大学和早稻田大学等顶尖学府。参与者还将畅游迪士尼乐园和富士山，在创造难忘回忆的同时，深入了解日本丰富的文化底蕴与科技传统。
动漫文化沉浸：通过参观杉并动画博物馆和藤子·F·不二雄博物馆（哆啦A梦博物馆），探索日本的动漫历史和产业。
动漫创作实践：在专业漫画家的指导下，学习创作自己的漫画和动画。
顶尖大学参访：游览东京大学和早稻田大学等知名学府，了解日本的学术卓越性。
文化与自然探索：在富士山体验日本的自然美景，在日本科学未来馆（Miraikan）感受前沿科技。
迪士尼乐园冒险：在东京迪士尼乐园度过一天，享受其神奇的景点，学习财务管理和创意设计。

- 世界知名的研究型大学，日本顶尖学府之一。
- 日本'超级国际化大学计划'（A类）成员，旨在提升国际竞争力。
- 亚太国际教育协会（APAIE）的创始成员之一。
- 杰出校友：七位日本前首相，近三分之一的日本国会议员，以及索尼、卡西欧、三星、东芝、乐天、任天堂、松下和三洋的创始人及CEO。
- 文化影响：30位校友获得日本最高文学奖——芥川奖，为日本大学之最。
- 全球影响力：以培养在政治、商业和文化领域具有全球影响力的毕业生而闻名。
- 概述：世界知名的研究型大学，全球最负盛名的综合性大学之一。
- 被誉为日本最高学术机构，也是原七所帝国大学之首。
- 历史：成立于1877年，是日本第一所国立综合性大学，亚洲最早的西式大学之一。
- 排名：在2016年CWUR世界大学排名中位列全球第13位，日本第1位。
- 杰出成就：培养了众多杰出校友，包括诺贝尔奖得主、菲尔兹奖获得者、日本首相和国会众议院议长。
- 全球影响力：在日本及全球范围内具有无可比拟的影响力。
CATS Academy Boston 的“常春藤之路”暑期项目是一个为期 15 天的沉浸式体验，专为 14 至 18 岁、有志于申请顶尖大学（尤其是常春藤盟校）的学生设计。该项目位于学术中心波士顿，独特地融合了严格的学术准备、文化探索和个人成长。参与者将参加 TOEFL 和 SAT 培训、大学申请研讨会，并参观哈佛大学和麻省理工学院等著名学府，同时体验顶尖美国寄宿学校的生活。

data.title: 马来西亚阿德科特学校 Adcote 夏令营

children.text: 2025年阿德科特学校国际夏令营为10至16岁的学生提供了一个独特的机会，让他们沉浸在一个文化丰富且学术氛围浓厚的环境中。阿德科特学校位于英格兰历史悠久的什鲁斯伯里镇，是英国顶尖的女子私立寄宿学校之一，成立于1907年。该项目将密集的英语语言课程与各种团体活动和短途旅行相结合，使参与者在体验英国文化的同时提升语言能力。夏令营由阿德科特学校全程管理，确保提供安全的环境，并配备24/7的监督与支持！
沉浸式英语学习：每日英语课程通过互动式教学，帮助学生提高语言能力！
文化探索之旅：游览英国标志性目的地，如牛津、伦敦、斯特拉特福（莎士比亚故居）以及风景如画的什鲁斯伯里小镇！
实践性活动：参与艺术工作坊、迷你奥运会、海滩出游以及传统英国游戏！
安全保障：由阿德科特学校全程管理，实行封闭式校园政策，并提供24/7全天候监管！
中文领队支持：全程由中文老师陪同往返，确保家长无后顾之忧！
结业证书：项目结束后颁发证书，以纪念学生的成就！

data.title: 2025 Japan Tokyo Anime Culture Exploration Summer Program

children.text: The 2025 Japan Tokyo Anime Culture Exploration Summer Program is a 7-day immersive experience designed for students aged 7 and above (with optional parental participation). This program offers a unique opportunity to dive deep into Japan's vibrant anime culture, visit iconic manga museums, interact face-to-face with professional manga artists, and explore top universities like the University of Tokyo and Waseda University. Participants will also enjoy excursions to Tokyo Disneyland and Mount Fuji, creating unforgettable memories while gaining insights into Japan's rich cultural heritage and technological traditions.

Learn to create your own manga and animation under the guidance of professional manga artists.

Experience Japan's natural beauty at Mount Fuji and cutting-edge technology at the Miraikan (National Museum of Emerging Science and Innovation).
Spend a day at Tokyo Disneyland, enjoying its magical attractions and learning financial literacy through fun activities.

A world-renowned research university and one of the most prestigious comprehensive universities globally. - Known as Japan's highest academic institution and the first of the original Imperial Universities. - History: Founded in 1877 as Japan's first national comprehensive university and one of Asia's earliest Western-style universities. - Ranking: Ranked 13th globally and 1st in Japan in the 2016 CWUR World University Rankings. - Achievements: Alumni include Nobel Prize winners, Fields Medalists, Japanese prime ministers, and Speakers of the House of Representatives. - Global Influence: Unmatched influence in Japan and worldwide.

data.title: 马来西亚阿德科特学校 Adcote 夏令营

children.text: 2025年阿德科特学校国际夏令营为10至16岁的学生提供了一个独特的机会，让他们沉浸在一个文化丰富且学术氛围浓厚的环境中。阿德科特学校位于英格兰历史悠久的什鲁斯伯里镇，是英国顶尖的女子私立寄宿学校之一，成立于1907年。该项目将密集的英语语言课程与各种团体活动和短途旅行相结合，使参与者在体验英国文化的同时提升语言能力。夏令营由阿德科特学校全程管理，确保提供安全的环境，并配备24/7的监督与支持！
沉浸式英语学习：每日英语课程通过互动式教学，帮助学生提高语言能力！
文化探索之旅：游览英国标志性目的地，如牛津、伦敦、斯特拉特福（莎士比亚故居）以及风景如画的什鲁斯伯里小镇！
实践性活动：参与艺术工作坊、迷你奥运会、海滩出游以及传统英国游戏！
安全保障：由阿德科特学校全程管理，实行封闭式校园政策，并提供24/7全天候监管！
中文领队支持：全程由中文老师陪同往返，确保家长无后顾之忧！
结业证书：项目结束后颁发证书，以纪念学生的成就！

data.title: 日本东京动漫文化探索访学营

children.text: 2025年夏季日本东京动漫文化探索项目是一个为期7天的沉浸式体验，专为7岁及以上学生设计（家长可选择参与）。该项目为学生提供了一个独特的机会，深入探索日本充满活力的动漫文化，参观标志性的漫画博物馆，与职业漫画家面对面交流，并探访东京大学和早稻田大学等顶尖学府。参与者还将畅游迪士尼乐园和富士山，在创造难忘回忆的同时，深入了解日本丰富的文化底蕴与科技传统。
动漫文化沉浸：通过参观杉并动画博物馆和藤子·F·不二雄博物馆（哆啦A梦博物馆），探索日本的动漫历史和产业。
动漫创作实践：在专业漫画家的指导下，学习创作自己的漫画和动画。
顶尖大学参访：游览东京大学和早稻田大学等知名学府，了解日本的学术卓越性。
文化与自然探索：在富士山体验日本的自然美景，在日本科学未来馆（Miraikan）感受前沿科技。
迪士尼乐园冒险：在东京迪士尼乐园度过一天，享受其神奇的景点，学习财务管理和创意设计。

- 全球影响力：在日本及全球范围内具有无可比拟的影响力。

data.title: 2025 Japan Tokyo Anime Culture Exploration Summer Program

children.text: The 2025 Japan Tokyo Anime Culture Exploration Summer Program is a 7-day immersive experience designed for students aged 7 and above (with optional parental participation). This program offers a unique opportunity to dive deep into Japan's vibrant anime culture, visit iconic manga museums, interact face-to-face with professional manga artists, and explore top universities like the University of Tokyo and Waseda University. Participants will also enjoy excursions to Tokyo Disneyland and Mount Fuji, creating unforgettable memories while gaining insights into Japan's rich cultural heritage and technological traditions.
Explore Japan's anime history and industry through visits to Suginami Animation Museum and Fujiko F. Fujio Museum (Doraemon Museum).
Learn to create your own manga and animation under the guidance of professional manga artists.
Tour prestigious institutions like the University of Tokyo and Waseda University to understand Japan's academic excellence.
Experience Japan's natural beauty at Mount Fuji and cutting-edge technology at the Miraikan (National Museum of Emerging Science and Innovation).
Spend a day at Tokyo Disneyland, enjoying its magical attractions and learning financial literacy through fun activities.

Seven Japanese prime ministers, nearly one-third of Japan's National Diet members, and founders/CEOs of Sony, Casio, Samsung, Toshiba, Rakuten, Nintendo, Panasonic, and Sanyo. - Cultural Impact: 30 alumni have won the Akutagawa Prize, Japan's highest literary award. - Global Influence: Known for producing graduates with global impact in politics, business, and culture.

A world-renowned research university and one of the most prestigious comprehensive universities globally. - Known as Japan's highest academic institution and the first of the original Imperial Universities. - History: Founded in 1877 as Japan's first national comprehensive university and one of Asia's earliest Western-style universities. - Ranking: Ranked 13th globally and 1st in Japan in the 2016 CWUR World University Rankings. - Achievements: Alumni include Nobel Prize winners, Fields Medalists, Japanese prime ministers, and Speakers of the House of Representatives. - Global Influence: Unmatched influence in Japan and worldwide.

The Epsom College International Summer Camp offers students aged 12-17 a unique opportunity to experience elite British education in a prestigious boarding school environment. This program combines intensive English language learning with a wide range of academic subjects and extracurricular activities. Located on Epsom College's beautiful 84-acre campus just 15 miles from London, students benefit from world-class facilities while exploring British culture through organized excursions to London, Oxford, and other historic sites. With expert teaching from qualified staff, 24-hour supervision, and comprehensive boarding facilities, this summer camp provides the perfect balance of academic enrichment, cultural immersion, and recreational activities.（Application Deadline: 5/05, 5/19; 6/1）
Experience the best of British education in a leading English-speaking country renowned for its world-class academic resources.
Stay and dine at Epsom College, a historic institution with a legacy of academic excellence and a nurturing environment.
Small class sizes (under 20 students) with British Council-certified teachers, ensuring personalized attention and active participation.
Interact with students from diverse backgrounds, fostering international friendships and cultural confidence.
Explore London, Oxford, and Cambridge, with expert-guided tours of iconic sites like the British Museum and National Gallery.
Secure campus with 24/7 supervision, ensuring a safe and supportive environment for all participants.

The Adcote School International Summer Camp 2025 offers a unique opportunity for students aged 10-16 to immerse themselves in a culturally enriching and academically stimulating environment. Located in the historic town of Shrewsbury, England, Adcote School is one of the UK's top elite private boarding schools for girls, founded in 1907. The program combines intensive English language courses with a variety of group activities and excursions, allowing participants to experience British culture while enhancing their language skills. The camp is fully managed by Adcote School, ensuring a safe and secure environment with 24/7 supervision and support!

Daily English classes designed to improve language proficiency through interactive and engaging lessons! 2. Cultural Excursions: Explore iconic British destinations such as Oxford, London, and Stratford-upon-Avon (Shakespeare's birthplace), as well as the charming town of Shrewsbury! 3. Hands-On Activities: Participate in art workshops, mini-Olympics, beach outings, and traditional British games! 4. Safe and Secure: Fully managed by Adcote School with closed-campus policies and 24/7 supervision! 5. Chinese Group Leaders: Accompanied by Chinese teachers for round-trip support, ensuring a smooth and worry-free experience for parents! 6. Certificate of Completion: Receive a certificate at the end of the program to commemorate your achievements!

Traditional British boarding school dormitories with twin or multi-bed rooms, equipped with shared or private bathrooms, common areas, and recreational facilities! - Meals: Three meals per day provided on campus, featuring a mix of traditional British and international cuisines. Special dietary needs can be accommodated with prior notice! - Facilities: Access to state-of-the-art facilities including art studios, music rooms, indoor sports halls, outdoor tennis and basketball courts, dance studios, and cooking classrooms! - Activities: A mix of academic, cultural, and recreational activities, including: - English language classes - Art and craft workshops - Outdoor exploration and sports - Evening entertainment such as movie nights, treasure hunts, and campfires!
July 6 – July 19, 2025! - Session 2: July 20 – August 2, 2025! - Session 3: August 3 – August 16, 2025!

10-16 years old (boys and girls)! - English Level: Beginner or above! - Independence: Ability to live independently (no prior boarding experience required)! - No Entrance Exams: No written tests or interviews required for admission!
Students may require a UK visitor visa; assistance provided! - Insurance: International health insurance recommended! - Transportation: Airport transfers included with Chinese group leaders!

data.title: 英国名校阿德科特学校 Adcote 夏令营

children.text: 2025年阿德科特学校国际夏令营为10至16岁的学生提供了一个独特的机会，让他们沉浸在一个文化丰富且学术氛围浓厚的环境中。阿德科特学校位于英格兰历史悠久的什鲁斯伯里镇，是英国顶尖的女子私立寄宿学校之一，成立于1907年。该项目将密集的英语语言课程与各种团体活动和短途旅行相结合，使参与者在体验英国文化的同时提升语言能力。夏令营由阿德科特学校全程管理，确保提供安全的环境，并配备24/7的监督与支持！（截止日期： 5/05, 5/19; 6/1）

沉浸式英语学习：每日英语课程通过互动式教学，帮助学生提高语言能力！ 文化探索之旅:游览英国标志性目的地，如牛津、伦敦、斯特拉特福（莎士比亚故居）以及风景如画的什鲁斯伯里小镇！ 实践性活动:参与艺术工作坊、迷你奥运会、海滩出游以及传统英国游戏！ 安全保障:由阿德科特学校全程管理，实行封闭式校园政策，并提供24/7全天候监管！ 中文领队支持:全程由中文老师陪同往返，确保家长无后顾之忧！ 结业证书:项目结束后颁发证书，以纪念学生的成就！
住宿：传统英式寄宿学校宿舍，提供双人间或多人间，配备共享或独立浴室、公共区域及娱乐设施！
餐饮：每日三餐在校内提供，融合传统英式与国际美食。如有特殊饮食需求，可提前告知安排！
设施：可使用先进设施，包括艺术工作室、音乐教室、室内体育馆、户外网球和篮球场、舞蹈室以及烹饪教室！
活动：结合学术、文化与娱乐活动，包括：
- 晚间娱乐活动，如电影之夜、寻宝游戏和篝火晚会！
独立性：具备独立生活能力（无需寄宿经验）！
无需入学考试：无需笔试或面试即可报名！
签证：学生可能需要英国访问签证；提供协助！
保险：建议购买国际健康保险！
交通：包括机场接送，由中文领队陪同！

data.title: 英国爱普森公学国际夏令营

children.text: 爱普森学院国际夏令营为12-17岁的学生提供了在一个享有盛誉的英国寄宿学校环境中体验精英英国教育的独特机会。该项目将密集的英语语言学习与广泛的学术科目和课外活动相结合。爱普森学院美丽的84英亩校园位于距离伦敦仅15英里的地方，学生可以使用世界一流的设施，同时通过组织前往伦敦、牛津和其他历史遗址的远足来探索英国文化。在合格教师的专业教学、24小时监督和全面的寄宿设施下，这个夏令营提供了学术丰富、文化沉浸和娱乐活动的完美平衡。（截止日期 5/05, 5/19; 6/1）
• 顶级英国目的地：在这个以世界一流学术资源闻名的英语国家，体验最优质的英式教育。
• 精英学校体验：在埃普森学院（Epsom College）住宿和用餐，这是一所历史悠久、学术卓越并充满关怀环境的学府。
• 语言沉浸：小班教学（每班少于20名学生），由英国文化协会认证的教师授课，确保个性化关注和积极参与。
• 全球社区：与来自不同背景的学生互动，培养国际友谊和文化自信。
• 文化游览：探索伦敦、牛津和剑桥，由专家带领参观大英博物馆和国家美术馆等标志性景点。
• 安全与舒适：校园安全，提供24/7全天候监管，确保所有参与者的安全和支持性环境。

'剑桥峰会'学术夏令营是一个为期16天的项目，专为13至18岁、渴望体验世界顶尖大学生活的学生设计。该项目在剑桥大学举办，结合了严谨的学术课程、实践工作坊和文化沉浸体验。参与者将与剑桥大学教授互动，探索人工智能、商业、社会学和计算机科学等领域的前沿话题，并获得关于大学生活和职业规划的宝贵见解。该项目注重学术卓越与个人成长，是通往常春藤盟校及更广阔天地的桥梁。（截止日期： 5/20；6/03）
剑桥大学教授：直接向剑桥大学教职员工学习，他们以其专业知识和开创性研究而闻名。
个性化学术指导：获得一对一的导师指导和论文反馈，提升学术背景。
官方认证：获得剑桥大学教授颁发的结业证书及个性化推荐信。
精英奖学金：优秀参与者有机会获得500英镑奖学金。
文化沉浸：体验剑桥生活，包括康河撑船、正式晚宴以及牛津和伦敦的游览。
小班教学：每期课程限99名学生，确保个性化关注和支持性学习环境。

The 'Cambridge Summit' Academic Summer Camp is a 16-day program designed for students aged 13 to 18 eager to experience life at a world-leading university. Hosted at the University of Cambridge, this program combines rigorous academic courses, hands-on workshops, and cultural immersion experiences. Participants will engage with Cambridge professors, explore cutting-edge topics in artificial intelligence, business, sociology, and computer science, and gain valuable insights into university life and career planning. Focused on academic excellence and personal growth, this program serves as a bridge to Ivy League schools and beyond.（Application Deadline: 5/20；6/03）
Learn directly from University of Cambridge staff renowned for their expertise and groundbreaking research.
Receive one-on-one guidance and essay feedback to enhance your academic profile.
Earn a completion certificate and personalized reference letter from Cambridge professors.
Outstanding participants may receive a £500 scholarship.
Experience Cambridge life with punting on the River Cam, formal dinners, and tours of Oxford and London.
Limited to 99 students per session, ensuring personalized attention and a supportive learning environment.

新加坡科学与创新STEM夏令营是一个为期7天的项目，专为7岁及以上学生设计（家长可选择参与）。该夏令营为学生提供了一个独特的机会，通过动手实践、互动工作坊以及参观新加坡科学馆和南洋理工大学（NTU）等标志性机构，探索新加坡的前沿科技。参与者将参与STEM项目，学习人工智能与环境可持续发展的知识，并体验新加坡丰富的文化遗产，同时还能享受滨海湾花园和新加坡环球影城等世界级景点的乐趣。

The Singapore Science and Innovation STEM Summer Camp is a 7-day program designed for students aged 7 and above (with optional parental participation). This camp offers a unique opportunity to explore cutting-edge technology through hands-on practice, interactive workshops, and visits to iconic institutions like the Singapore Science Centre and Nanyang Technological University (NTU). Participants will engage in STEM projects, learn about artificial intelligence and environmental sustainability, and experience Singapore's rich cultural heritage while enjoying world-class attractions such as Gardens by the Bay and Universal Studios Singapore.

CATS Academy Boston 的“常春藤之路”暑期项目是一个为期 15 天的沉浸式体验，专为 14 至 18 岁、有志于申请顶尖大学（尤其是常春藤盟校）的学生设计。该项目位于学术中心波士顿，独特地融合了严格的学术准备、文化探索和个人成长。参与者将参加 TOEFL 和 SAT 培训、大学申请研讨会，并参观哈佛大学和麻省理工学院等著名学府，同时体验顶尖美国寄宿学校的生活。
• 常春藤名校预备: 密集的托福 (TOEFL) 和 SAT 培训，以及个性化的大学申请指导。
• 顶尖高中体验: 入住并学习于 CATS Academy Boston —— 一所领先的国际寄宿学校，拥有将学生送入常春藤盟校的卓越记录。
• 大学参访: 参观哈佛大学、麻省理工学院 (MIT) 和其他顶尖学府，深入了解校园生活和卓越学术。
• 文化社交活动: 参加主题派对、城市探索和团队建设活动，培养跨文化友谊。
• 专家指导: 向经验丰富的教师和大学招生顾问学习，获得大学申请的实践支持。

The "Path to Ivy League" Summer Program at CATS Academy Boston is a 15-day immersive experience designed for students aged 14 to 18 who are aiming to prepare for top-tier universities, particularly Ivy League institutions. Participants will engage in TOEFL and SAT training, attend university application workshops, and visit prestigious institutions like Harvard and MIT, all while experiencing life at a top American boarding school.​

大学体验：项目包括参观剑桥大学历史悠久的学院、剑桥学者的讲座以及国际 大学展。
个人成长：学生将培养独立性、跨文化沟通能力，并深入了解自己的学术兴 趣。
•    住宿：学生将入住剑桥大学宿舍（单人间或双人间），宿舍位于 Peterhouse 学 院或 Jesus 学院。

•    24/7 监管：经验丰富的工作人员提供全天候支持。
•     健康与安全：项目包括消防演习、24 小时安保和紧急预案。

data.title: N剑桥国际学术夏校（项目1）

children.text: 剑桥国际学术夏令营是一个为期 14 天的沉浸式教育项目，专为 12 岁及以上的学生设
计。项目在剑桥大学两所最负盛名的学院——彼得学院（Peterhouse）和耶稣学院
（Jesus College）举办，结合了学术严谨性、文化探索和个人成长。学生将参与小班
教学，探索广泛的学科领域，并参加课外活动，培养领导力、创造力和全球公民意
小班教学：每班约 8 名学生，确保个性化关注。
• 多样化的学术课程：提供超过 20 门学术课程，涵盖航空航天工程、人工智能、
创意写作和国际关系等领域。
• 国际化学生群体：90%的参与者为国际学生，营造多元文化学习环境。
• 住宿安排：学生入住剑桥大学学生宿舍，体验剑桥学生的生活。
• 顶尖师资：课程由来自全球顶尖大学（包括剑桥和牛津）的讲师授课。
• 个性化报告：学生将获得一份由教师签名的个性化报告，可用于未来的学术申
• 国际大学展：学生有机会直接与全球大学的招生官互动。
• 安全保障：1:6 的师生比例确保安全和支持性的环境。

data.title: N Cambridge International Academic Summer School 14 days

children.text: The Cambridge International Academic Summer School is a 14-day immersive    educational experience designed for students aged 12 and above. Hosted at two of  Cambridge University's most prestigious colleges, Peterhouse and Jesus College, the program offers a unique blend of academic rigor, cultural exploration, and
personal growth. Students will engage in small-class learning, explore a wide range of academic disciplines, and participate in extracurricular activities that foster
Small Class Sizes: Each class consists of approximately 8 students, ensuring personalized attention.
•    Diverse Academic Offerings: Over 20 academic courses are available, ranging from Aerospace Engineering and AI to Creative
•    Global Student Body: 90% of participants are international students, fostering a multicultural learning environment.
•    Accommodation: Students stay in Cambridge University student  dormitories, experiencing life as a Cambridge student.
•     Expert Faculty: Courses are taught by instructors from top global universities, including Cambridge and Oxford.
•     Personalized Reports: Students receive a teacher-signed, personalized report that can be used for future academic applications.
•     International University Fair: Students have the opportunity to interact  directly with admissions officers from global universities.
•    Safety and Support: A 1:6 staff-to-student ratio ensures a safe and supportive environment.

The 14-day program is structured to balance academic learning, cultural exploration, and recreational activities. Below is a sample itinerary:
Day    Morning                       Afternoon                                             Evening
D1      Arrival at the University of Cambridge     Welcome to Cambridge—Icebreaker
D2      Student Welcome Ceremony / Elective Courses           Cambridge Mission @  Chapel Court / Guided Oxford City Tour      (Geoff Howe: Sharing from a Cambridge Porter)          -
D3      Elective Courses      King’s College Tour / Fitzwilliam Museum / Football Match / Tote Bag Painting               Movie Night
D4      Movie Night   Elective Courses / Board Games + Just Dance Ghost Tour / Art History Lecture
D5      Day Trip to London  Day Trip to London  Day Trip to London
D6      Elective Courses      Elective Courses / Special Lecture           Bowling / British
D7      Elective Courses      Tennis Match / Mysterious Cambridge Tour       Watching
Shakespeare in Love / Watching Hamlet at King’s College
D8      Elective Courses      Punting on the River Cam / Hockey Match         Spelling
D9      Elective Courses      Elective Courses / Free Time        Lecture: University
D10    Elective Courses      International Education Fair—Direct Interaction with
Admissions Officers / Yoga Class Cambridge University Student Panel Discussion D11    Elective Courses      Elective Courses / Free Time        Expert Lecture
D12    Elective Courses      Talent Show  Karaoke / British Sports Activities
D13    Final Assessment for Elective Courses    Free Time / Graduation Ceremony
1.  Academic Excellence: Courses are taught by renowned faculty, including Dr. Chinedu Nwaduru(Oxford), Dr. Kritika Jerath (Cambridge), and Dr. Kristian  Saull (Cambridge).
2.  Cultural Immersion: Students participate in activities like Shakespearean  theater performances, punting on the River Cam, and guided museum  tours.
3.  Extracurricular Activities: From sports tournaments to creative
workshops, students engage in a variety of activities that enhance their social and leadership skills.
4.  University Exposure: The program includes visits to Cambridge’s historic
colleges, lectures by Cambridge scholars, and an international university fair.
5.  Personal Growth: Students develop independence, cross-cultural
communication skills, and a deeper understanding of their academic interests.
•    Accommodation: Students stay in Cambridge University
dormitories (single or double rooms) at either Peterhouse or Jesus College.
•     Meals: Breakfast and dinner are provided in the college dining halls, offering a variety of nutritious options. Lunch is self-catered, allowing students to explore local restaurants and cafes.
•    24/7 Supervision: Experienced staff provide round-the-clock support.
•     Health and Safety: The program includes fire drills, 24-hour security, and emergency protocols.
•    Travel Insurance: Comprehensive travel insurance is included.
•     Included: Tuition, accommodation, meals (breakfast and dinner), activities, and travel insurance.
•     Not Included: International airfare, visa fees, personal expenses, and optional activities.

data.title: 探索我们的项目
data.subtitle: 通过我们多样化的教育项目探索学习机会的世界

data.name: Steven Stanley
data.testimonial: I had an enjoyable time exploring the streets of Kyoto and immersing myself in its rich culture, especially experiencing the powerful beats of Japanese drums and participating in vibrant summer festivals. The tea ceremony workshop, calligraphy classes, and homestay experience with a local family truly deepened my understanding of traditional Japanese values and modern lifestyle.

data.name: 史蒂文·斯坦利
data.testimonial: 我在京都的街头漫步，沉浸在其丰富的文化中，度过了非常愉快的时光，尤其是体验了日本太鼓的强劲节奏并参与了充满活力的夏日祭典。茶道工作坊、书法课程以及与当地家庭的寄宿体验真正加深了我对传统日本价值观和现代生活方式的理解。

data.name: Kheng Lee
data.testimonial: My students couldn't stop sharing their exciting experiences after the trip to Singapore. I, too, thoroughly enjoyed the excursion to Gardens by the Bay, where we marveled at a stunning variety of flora and fauna in the beautiful indoor gardens, creating unforgettable memories.

data.name: 李康
data.testimonial: 这是我的学生们在新加坡之旅后无法停止分享他们的激动经历。我也非常享受这次滨海湾花园的游览，我们在美丽的室内花园中惊叹于各种令人惊叹的动植物，创造了难忘的回忆。

data.name: 李维
data.program: Edgoing与新加坡管理大学（SMU）合作的财富管理项目
data.testimonial: 我是李伟，17岁，来自上海。Edgoing的新加坡管理大学项目点燃了我的金融热情。讲座和投资组合任务提升了我的技能，导师指导让我受益匪浅。结业证书增强了我的大学申请信心，我决心攻读金融学位！

data.name: Li Wei
data.program: Wealth Management Program by Edgoing at SMU
data.testimonial: I'm Li Wei, 17, from Shanghai. Edgoing's SMU program ignited my finance passion. Lectures, portfolio tasks, and mentorship honed my skills. The certificate boosted my university applications—I'm set on finance degrees!

data.name: Xiao Ye
data.testimonial: This trip transformed my worldview! Hands-on learning, cultural experiences, and incredible friends made it unforgettable. Supportive staff ensured safety. I'm excited for the next program and staying connected with newfound friends.

data.name: 小野
data.program: 英国国际学校暑期项目
data.testimonial: 这次旅行太棒了！我学到了新东西，体验了不同的文化，还交到了很棒的朋友。工作人员很友好，也确保了我们安全。我已经开始期待下一次旅行了，等不及再和我的新朋友们聊天了！

data.name: 张女士
data.testimonial: 起初我担心安全问题，但团队及时沟通，孩子得到了很好的照顾。她回来后更加自信、独立，视野也更开阔了——强烈推荐这次改变人生的经历！

data.name: Mrs. Zhang
data.testimonial: I was initially concerned about safety, but the team ensured constant updates, and my child was well cared for. She returned more confident, independent, and globally aware—highly recommend this transformative experience!

data.name: 陈女士
data.program: Edgoing在新加坡管理大学举办的财富管理项目
data.testimonial: Edgoing的新加坡管理大学项目令人惊叹，结合专家讲座、金融科技公司参访和文化之旅。李伟提升了技能，明确了方向，激发了金融抱负，将学术、行业与文化融合成一场精彩的教育之旅。

data.name: 马来西亚艾德科特学校
data.location: 马来西亚吉隆坡大都会区

children.text: 马来西亚艾德科特学校是英国著名学府艾德科特学校（UK）的第四个海外分校，继中国校区之后建立。该校曾荣获 2020 年和 2021 年最佳英国独立学校奖，并在 2023 年英国近 3000 所中学中排名第 83 名。在短短五年内，来自 Adcote 全球校区的 13 名毕业生被牛津大学和剑桥大学录取。学校融合了东西方教育理念，通过全球赋能、全面发展、身心健康以及成果导向的方式，培养具有传承、创新、独立性、领导力、全球视野和社会责任感的学生。
距离吉隆坡国际机场 40 分钟车程，马来西亚艾德科特学校提供国际标准的高端校园、安全的环境、具有竞争力的费用，并注重创新、独立性和领导力的培养。主要亮点包括：
位于吉隆坡大都会区，距离吉隆坡国际机场仅 40 分钟车程。

Adcote School Malaysia is the fourth overseas branch of the prestigious British institution Adcote School (UK), established after the China campus. It has won the Best British Independent School Award in 2020 and 2021, and ranked 83rd among nearly 3000 UK secondary schools in 2023. In just five years, 13 graduates from Adcote's global campuses have been admitted to Oxford and Cambridge Universities. The school integrates Eastern and Western educational philosophies, fostering students with a global perspective, innovation, independence, leadership, and social responsibility through a holistic approach.

Located 40 minutes from KL International Airport, Adcote School Malaysia offers a premium campus with global standards, safe environment, cost-effective fees, and a focus on innovation, independence, and leadership. Highlights include:
Geographical Location: Situated in the Kuala Lumpur Metropolitan Area, only 40 minutes from KL International Airport.
Premium Campus: Built to international standards, managed by Chinese shareholders, providing on-campus apartments.
Safe Environment: Reasonable fees, high cost-effectiveness.

Adcote School Malaysia provides education from kindergarten to senior high school, with specialized programs like IGCSE, A-Level, ESL enhancement, and a wide range of extracurricular activities to ensure holistic development. The academic program includes:
Academic Stages: Kindergarten, Primary, Junior High, Senior High (IGCSE & A-Level).
Specialized Programs: ESL English Enhancement, CCA Extracurricular Activities.
Extracurricular Activities: Golf, rock climbing, swimming, karting, karate, ball sports, languages, mathematics, cooking, crafts, etc.
Swimming pool, tennis courts, squash courts, bowling alley, SPA, libraries, laboratories, gym, sports centers, student apartments, and medical support. Campus facilities include:
Main Entrance (South): Swimming pool, tennis courts, squash courts, bowling alley, SPA, dining hall.
Teaching Block, Library, Laboratories, Dining Hall, Gym: Golf course, dining center.
Outdoor Sports Field (Track, Football, Rugby): Extreme sports center (rock climbing, water sports, skateboarding, archery, racing).
Indoor Sports Hall (Rock Climbing, Badminton, Basketball, Football): Residential area (long-term rental for parents).
Student Apartments, Medical Center, Apartment Facilities: 400 meters from petrol station and commercial area.
Man-Made Lake: Planned for kayaking; equestrian facilities are under planning, with an existing equestrian center.
Admission involves an application fee, interviews, and assessments (e.g., CAT4, OPT). The admission process includes:
Admission Requirements: Online/in-person interview and assessment (CAT4, OPT, etc., depending on grade level).
